name: $resourceType
desc: Returns the FHIR type name for this instance

name: $url
desc: Returns: An absolute URI that is used to identify this search parameter when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance. This SHALL be a URL, SHOULD be globally unique, and SHOULD be an address at which this search parameter is (or will be) published. The URL SHOULD include the major version of the search parameter. For more information see [Technical and Business Versions](resource.html#versions).

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: An absolute URI that is used to identify this search parameter when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance. This SHALL be a URL, SHOULD be globally unique, and SHOULD be an address at which this search parameter is (or will be)

name: $::version
desc: Returns: The identifier that is used to identify this version of the search parameter when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or instance. This is an arbitrary value managed by the search parameter author and is not expected to be globally unique. For example, it might be a timestamp (e.g. yyyymmdd) if a managed version is not available. There is also no expectation that versions can be placed in a lexicographical sequence.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The identifier that is used to identify this version of the search parameter when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or instance. This is an arbitrary value managed by the search parameter author and is not expected to be globally unique.

name: $::name
desc: Returns: A natural language name identifying the search parameter. This name should be usable as an identifier for the module by machine processing applications such as code generation.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A natural language name identifying the search parameter. This name should be usable as an identifier for the module by machine processing applications such as code generation.

name: $status
desc: Returns: The status of this search parameter. Enables tracking the life-cycle of the content.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The status of this search parameter. Enables tracking the life-cycle of the content.

name: $experimental
desc: Returns: A boolean value to indicate that this search parameter is authored for testing purposes (or education/evaluation/marketing), and is not intended to be used for genuine usage.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A boolean value to indicate that this search parameter is authored for testing purposes (or education/evaluation/marketing), and is not intended to be used for genuine usage.

name: $date
desc: Returns: The date  (and optionally time) when the search parameter was published. The date must change if and when the business version changes and it must change if the status code changes. In addition, it should change when the substantive content of the search parameter changes.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The date  (and optionally time) when the search parameter was published. The date must change if and when the business version changes and it must change if the status code changes. In addition, it should change when the substantive content of the search

name: $publisher
desc: Returns: The name of the individual or organization that published the search parameter.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The name of the individual or organization that published the search parameter.

name: $contact
desc: Returns: Contact details to assist a user in finding and communicating with the publisher.

name: $addcontact
desc: Contact details to assist a user in finding and communicating with the publisher.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Contact details to assist a user in finding and communicating with the publisher.

name: $useContext
desc: Returns: The content was developed with a focus and intent of supporting the contexts that are listed. These terms may be used to assist with indexing and searching for appropriate search parameter instances.

name: $adduseContext
desc: The content was developed with a focus and intent of supporting the contexts that are listed. These terms may be used to assist with indexing and searching for appropriate search parameter instances.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: The content was developed with a focus and intent of supporting the contexts that are listed. These terms may be used to assist with indexing and searching for appropriate search parameter instances.

name: $jurisdiction
desc: Returns: A legal or geographic region in which the search parameter is intended to be used.

name: $addjurisdiction
desc: A legal or geographic region in which the search parameter is intended to be used.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A legal or geographic region in which the search parameter is intended to be used.

name: $purpose
desc: Returns: Explaination of why this search parameter is needed and why it has been designed as it has.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Explaination of why this search parameter is needed and why it has been designed as it has.

name: $code
desc: Returns: The code used in the URL or the parameter name in a parameters resource for this search parameter.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The code used in the URL or the parameter name in a parameters resource for this search parameter.

name: $base
desc: Returns: The base resource type(s) that this search parameter can be used against.

name: $addbase
desc: The base resource type(s) that this search parameter can be used against.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The base resource type(s) that this search parameter can be used against.

name: $::type
desc: Returns: The type of value a search parameter refers to, and how the content is interpreted.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The type of value a search parameter refers to, and how the content is interpreted.

name: $derivedFrom
desc: Returns: Where this search parameter is originally defined. If a derivedFrom is provided, then the details in the search parameter must be consistent with the definition from which it is defined. I.e. the parameter should have the same meaning, and (usually) the functionality should be a proper subset of the underlying search parameter.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Where this search parameter is originally defined. If a derivedFrom is provided, then the details in the search parameter must be consistent with the definition from which it is defined. I.e. the parameter should have the same meaning, and (usually) the f

name: $description
desc: Returns: A free text natural language description of the search parameter from a consumer's perspective. and how it used.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A free text natural language description of the search parameter from a consumer's perspective. and how it used.

name: $expression
desc: Returns: A FHIRPath expression that returns a set of elements for the search parameter.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A FHIRPath expression that returns a set of elements for the search parameter.

name: $xpath
desc: Returns: An XPath expression that returns a set of elements for the search parameter.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: An XPath expression that returns a set of elements for the search parameter.

name: $xpathUsage
desc: Returns: How the search parameter relates to the set of elements returned by evaluating the xpath query.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: How the search parameter relates to the set of elements returned by evaluating the xpath query.

name: $target
desc: Returns: Types of resource (if a resource is referenced).

name: $addtarget
desc: Types of resource (if a resource is referenced).

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Types of resource (if a resource is referenced).

name: $comparator
desc: Returns: Comparators supported for the search parameter.

name: $addcomparator
desc: Comparators supported for the search parameter.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Comparators supported for the search parameter.

name: $modifier
desc: Returns: A modifier supported for the search parameter.

name: $addmodifier
desc: A modifier supported for the search parameter.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A modifier supported for the search parameter.

name: $chain
desc: Returns: Contains the names of any search parameters which may be chained to the containing search parameter. Chained parameters may be added to search parameters of type reference, and specify that resources will only be returned if they contain a reference to a resource which matches the chained parameter value. Values for this field should be drawn from SearchParameter.code for a parameter on the target resource type.

name: $addchain
desc: Contains the names of any search parameters which may be chained to the containing search parameter. Chained parameters may be added to search parameters of type reference, and specify that resources will only be returned if they contain a reference to a resource which matches the chained parameter value. Values for this field should be drawn from SearchParameter.code for a parameter on the target resource type.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Contains the names of any search parameters which may be chained to the containing search parameter. Chained parameters may be added to search parameters of type reference, and specify that resources will only be returned if they contain a reference to a

name: $component
desc: Returns: Used to define the parts of a composite search parameter.

name: $addcomponent
desc: Used to define the parts of a composite search parameter.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Used to define the parts of a composite search parameter.
